items.sentence: We've already spoken to Tom, but we haven't spoken to Mary yet.
Tom knew Mary had told everybody that she was going to do that.
Tom knew that Mary had told everybody she was going to do that.
I'd rather live happily in the present than go down in history.
After discussing it with my father, I decided to change my job.
If you eat your vegetables, you can have ice cream for dessert.
I wish I'd called you earlier and explained this to you better.
The weather forecast said that there would be a storm tomorrow.
Tom explained it to me, but I'm still not sure I understand it.
What matters most now is whether Tom decides to do that or not.
When I was younger, many people used to say I was good-looking.
Tom told me that if I wouldn't help him, he'd ask someone else.
If we were to live on the moon, how large would the earth look?
I wouldn't have done that if I'd known it would make Tom angry.
All the houses were shaking and alarms were ringing everywhere.
The sprinkler broke and the gardener had to use the hose again.
Tom said he didn't have enough money to buy food for everybody.
Tom said that he's scared that his phone is smarter than he is.
Tom used his handkerchief to wipe the tears from Mary's cheeks.
Beautiful, intelligent and hot - this describes what he is not.
